entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who becomes interested in a bird on the windowsill, giving Harry time to dry his eyes. He is described as having twinkling eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who has been crying and is now asking Dumbledore about the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as something that was sent to Harry by his father.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is introduced as a character who said Snape hates Harry because he hated Harry's father.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who was hated by Harry's father and now hates Harry in return.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who has a similar relationship with Harry as Snape does.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore have a conversation about the Invisibility Cloak.
Quirrell said that Snape hates Harry because he hated Harry's father.
Harry is hated by Snape in return for his father's actions.
